description: Wander Ahmedabad's museums â€” a playlist of textile lanes, history, and quiet courtyard echoes.

items.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel National Museum
items.location_hint: Gandhi-Sardar Smruthi Chowk, Opp. Circuit House, Shahibag, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
items.opening_hours_text: 9:30 am to 5 pm, on all days of the week except Mondays. Timings for the 3D Interactive show is 7 pm and 7:45 pm.

items.name: Calico Museum Of Textiles
items.location_hint: The Retreat, Airport Rd, Opp. Rani Sati Mandir, Jain Colony, Shahibag, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
items.opening_hours_text: On all days of the week except Wednesdays; from 10 am to 12:30 pm and 2:45 pm to 4:30 pm.

items.name: Sanskar Kendra
items.location_hint: Bhagtacharya Road, Near Sardar Patel, Bridge, Paldi, Ahmedabad, Gujarat

items.name: Vechaar Utensils Museum
items.location_hint: Opp. Vasna Tol Naka, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380055
items.opening_hours_text: 1 pm to 3 pm and 5 pm to 10:30 pm. This place is open every day except Mondays.

items.name: Auto World Vintage Car Museum
items.location_hint: Dastan Estate Sardar Patel Ring Road Kathwada, Ahmedabad, Gujarat

items.name: Lalbhai Dalpatbhai Museum
items.opening_hours_text: 10: 30 am to 5: 30 pm. This museum is closed on Mondays.

items.name: Kites Museum
items.location_hint: Sankar Kender, Bhagtacharya Road, Kocharab, Paldi, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
items.opening_hours_text: 10 am-12 noon and 4 pm to 6 pm every day except Monday.

items.name: Shreyas Folk Museum
items.location_hint: Shreyas Tekra Rd, Opposite, Mithila Society, Bhudarpura, Ayojan Nagar, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
items.opening_hours_text: 9 am to 2 pm. The museum is open on all days of the week except Sundays.

items.name: Archer Art Gallery
items.location_hint: Girish Cold Drinks, 2nd Floor, Phoenix Opposite New, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
items.opening_hours_text: 10:30 am to 7 pm. The museum is open to visitors on all days of the week except Sundays.

items.name: Varso Toy Museum
items.location_hint: 1765 Dhobini Pole Haveli No, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
